When enabled, does not show the lockscreen or pattern screen. Neither on boot, nor when waking the device
Override the fullscreen request of applications. When enabled, status bar is always visible until hidden by button

Volume buttons behave normal. Press for volume change, long press for user action
Volume buttons behave reversed. Press for user action, long press for volume change
Assign home/back/menu/etc action to volume button up long press. Limited to screen on

Essa opção provou aumentar o gasto da bateria em ~3% por hora. Se você perceber um aumento no gasto enquanto a luz da trackball pulsa então este será o motivo. Não ative se você não deseja que isso ocorra.

Estas opções irão alterar a performance do seu sistema potencialmente para o pior. Elas são para experimento e requeremos que você não envie relatório de erros se você tiver alterado algo do padrão.

Customize the usage of memory to alter system performance
Compress memory for increased virtual capacity (requires reboot)
System can free more RAM when needed if asset bitmap memory can be reclaimed (requires reboot)
Attempt to keep the current home app in memory at all times
Avoid lost messages on low memory situations
Make NetworkLocationService killable. Frees some RAM, but Latitude isn\'t reporting location any more (requires restart of Maps)
KSM reduces physical memory requirements and improves performance
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Maximum amount of memory per VM heap (requires reboot)
Use the Dalvik just-in-time compiler (requires reboot)
Fix color banding and blur effect
Dithering improves image quality on some displays at the cost of performance (requires reboot)
Using 16bit transparency can improve scrolling performance, but may cause visual artifacts (requires reboot)
Don\'t show the boot animation for faster boot
Size of the SD Read Ahead Cache

The options in here will change the performance of your system, potentially for the worse. They are included for experimentation and we request that you do not file bug reports if you have changed any from the defaults
You have calibrate the battery and this will also refresh the batterystats

Ative para permitir redução de luzes. Usa histerese para reduzir tremores
